comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

OS WinXP Europe-Turkey-Turkish.
Thunderbir 7.0, Europe-Turkey-Turkish, Charset-ISO-8859-9.
MsOutlook, Europe-Turkey-Turkish, Charset-ISO-8859-9.

Outlook with more than one mail collected, sent (Collected Mail). I Thunderbird with this mails open.

Example; abc.eml(charset:ISO-8859-9), def.eml(charset:Windows-1254), ghi.eml(charset:UTF-8) etc. mails collected one multimail creating.


Actual results:

The Thunderbird inbox, mail opening. Collected mail in all mails reading no problem. But collected mail in random any mail (exmp. ghi.eml) and using "reply or farward".


Expected results:

the write message screen, original body message convert to absurd ascii characters.
